---
title: "Offshore Wind News"
description: "The latest in offshore wind news"
---

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(integral)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
library(lubridate)

news <- read_rds("data/news_table.rds")


nice_date <- stamp_date("Jan 31, 2021", quiet = T)

news1 <- news %>% slice(1)

news2 <- news %>% slice(4)
```

#### `r news1$title`
By `r news1$author`, **`r news1$source`**,  `r nice_date(date(news1$published_at))`

`r news1$description`

#### `r news2$title`
By `r news2$author`, **`r news2$source`**,  `r nice_date(date(news2$published_at))`

`r news2$description`
